Also, would appreciate it if you guys showed Mr. Azuki or @kentabeanmaster some love!

13/13

Taking all of these factors into account, this was an obvious bet I had to make on the Azuki team.

This is my ultimate conviction bet on the Azuki team's creativity, their thoughtfulness and their passion for this space.

12/13

It's obvious that the Azuki team has put in a ton of thought into each decision, from the 1/1 easter eggs in the collection to the red bean references. I have the utmost confidence that they'll continue to do a great job building out the lore and brand.

11/13
https://t.co/hCwNs8Qtvq

#3 Conviction in the Azuki Team

I don't think I need to touch on this topic too much since there's already been tons of great threads about why the Azuki team is so awesome, but here's a great thread by @alexhughsam that highlights the thoughtfulness of the team.

10/13

This again speaks to how detail-oriented the team is and how much thought they put into this collection. It's rare to find a collection where you're constantly finding new discoveries every day.

9/13

This Azuki would qualify as an unofficial 1/1 due to being the only Azuki with 3 red bean references (offhand, earring, clothing), along with the red background and type.

8/13

After countless hours of browsing the collection, I noticed that some looked special, but not as highly ranked, such as @ChipNFT's Fire Queen or @SA1NT99's Avatar Azuki.

This led me down a rabbit hole of discovering unique 1/1s throughout the collection.

Examples below:

7/13 https://t.co/A8C7ijXodG

They're a bit more difficult to locate compared to obvious rares in the collection, like spirits and golds, since you have to filter for the right combinations.

6/13

#2 Unofficial 1/1s and Rarity

Contrary to most other collections where it may be easy to identify the rarest items by filtering for 1/1s or using a rarity ranking like Rarity Sniffer, Azuki has hidden several "unofficial" 1/1s throughout the collection.

5/13

I believe that we've just scratched the surface for this concept of "taking the red bean" and that the Azuki team will continue to incorporate the red bean into future lore and branding.

4/13

From a more symbolic perspective, as @ZZZAGABOND best put it from yesterday's spaces, "taking the red bean" is a reference to the Matrix, but also a reference to the ethos of DeFi, which is community ownership over the platforms you use and constantly pushing the boundaries

3/13

#1 The Significance of the Red Bean

The red bean is arguably the single most important object in the entire Azuki lore. In terms of the lore, it grants you access to The Garden.

2/13

I recently picked up my grail Azuki, aka Mr. Azuki, for 110 ETH, my largest @AzukiZen purchase to date.

Here's a short thread on why I believe this smol red bean, amongst the many great beans, may be the single most important Azuki in the entire collection ğŸ§µ
